title: "Wave Getaways"
content:
Welcome to Wave Getaways! üåäüå¥

Our website is your go-to source for planning the ultimate beach vacation. With our stunning abstract image of waves crashing on the beach as our main wallpaper, we aim to inspire and excite you about your next travel destination.

Whether you're looking for a relaxing getaway or an adventurous trip filled with water sports, our website offers a variety of options to suit your needs. From luxurious resorts to cozy beachfront cottages, we have something for everyone.

Our user-friendly interface makes it easy to search and compare different accommodations, activities, and destinations. We also provide helpful travel tips and recommendations to ensure that your vacation is stress-free and unforgettable.

So what are you waiting for? Start planning your dream beach vacation today with Wave Getaways! üèñÔ∏è

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of waves crashing on the beach for a vacation or travel website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
